description: Information about proposed bus strike for Tuesday 13 January 2015

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["A 24-hour bus strike is planned on Friday 13 February. If the strike goes ahead it will affect bus services across London from about 04:00 Friday morning. It will also affect night bus services operating on Friday night into Saturday morning. Bus services during the day on Saturday 14 February should operate as normal."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We will update this page with more information as soon as we have it.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Bus services across London are likely to be affected","If you have a Bus \u0026 Tram Pass you will be able to use it on the Tube, DLR and London Overground. See Tickets","All other services will operate as normal","A further 24-hour strike is planned for Monday 16 February","Bus services on Saturday and Sunday are not affected and will run as normal"]}
